attributes.action: Save Avon and Somerset's Police Helicopter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to stop the Government from removing Avon and Somerset's police helicopter, known as the "Western Counties Air Operations Unit." 

If the current helicopter service is lost, it will take much longer to respond to call-outs, meaning that criminals could be long gone by the time the helicopter reaches them.
